title: What way(s) are there to transfer a file from my Pixel to Google Drive?
content:
Kinda new to this. Sometimes I need to save a file that is on my Pixel 3 to GD for safekeeping.

Right now I select the file in question in the FILES app and choose SHARE (to GD). Is that the usual method? Are there other (better) ways to do the transfer?

Thanks for your experience.
